name: Spring Scaffold 2022
description:
Mechanics:

  • use a and d to move. 
  • space to jump. hold space to jump higher.
  • tab to open/close inventory/craft menu.
  •  use the mouse to interact with items in inventory.
  • e is the universal interaction button.

Credits:

  • Brooke Cravotta (Team Lead/Programmer)
  • Ethan Madjus (Team Lead/Programmer)
  • Kaylie Fukumoto (Game Design)
  • Kevin Luu (Programmer)
  • Megan Tsoi (Programmer)
  • Danica Jew (Artist)
  • Euclid Marquez (Artist)
  • Brianna McGlasson (Audio Design)

BG Music: Kevin MacLeod - Pixelland
